rows.label: bf10220100_0010
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf10220100_0020
rows.name: You guys...

rows.label: bf10220100_0030
rows.name: R-Rex...

rows.label: bf10220100_0040
rows.name:
Why are we all here?
I thought I was...

rows.label: bf10220100_0050
rows.name:
...I wanted to see
The shape of your hearts...

rows.label: bf10220100_0060
rows.name: That voice...!

rows.label: bf10220100_0070
rows.name: You're-!

rows.label: bf10220100_0080
rows.name:
My name is Klaus.
The creator of this world.

rows.label: bf10220100_0090
rows.name: I have been watching over you all this time.

rows.label: bf10220100_0100
rows.name:
What you think, what you desire,
what you have been able to accomplish.

rows.label: bf10220100_0110
rows.name: So that was your doing just now?

rows.label: bf10220100_0120
rows.name:
Yes. They weren't really you.
They were different versions.

rows.label: bf10220100_0130
rows.name:
I wanted to see your other selves,
your alternative forms...

rows.label: bf10220100_0140
rows.name: Our other selves?

rows.label: bf10220100_0150
rows.name:
What? You're saying we all
have those feelings deep down?

rows.label: bf10220100_0160
rows.name: Are those our true feelings?

rows.label: bf10220100_0170
rows.name: No way, even Turtle-chan?

rows.label: bf10220100_0180
rows.name:
Looks like you all were shown
similar things to what I saw.

rows.label: bf10220100_0190
rows.name:
That's disgusting.
Who do you think you are?

rows.label: bf10220100_0200
rows.name:
...Those were
the fears you all carry within you...

rows.label: bf10220100_0210
rows.name: That makes no sense!

rows.label: bf10220100_0220
rows.name: What was your purpose in doing this?

rows.label: bf10220100_0230
rows.name: Those weren't exactly pleasant experiences.

rows.label: bf10220100_0240
rows.name: After countless ages, how humanity has changed...

rows.label: bf10220100_0250
rows.name: and where humanity is headed.

rows.label: bf10220100_0260
rows.name: That's what I wanted to find out.

rows.label: bf10220100_0270
rows.name: Were you disappointed by what you saw?

rows.label: bf10220100_0280
rows.name: No...

rows.label: bf10220100_0290
rows.name:
As you stand before me right now...
That is your true self.

rows.label: bf10220100_0300
rows.name: That is enough.

rows.label: bf10220100_0310
rows.name:
God,
I came here because I met Homura.

rows.label: bf10220100_0320
rows.name: Is this truly Eden?

rows.label: bf10220100_0330
rows.name: Are you really...

rows.label: bf10220100_0340
rows.name: I will show you everything.

rows.label: bf10220100_0350
rows.name: My memories... and the memories of this world...
